geometries

Class Geometry

  • java.lang.Object
    • geometries.Geometry
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Plane, RadialGeometry, Triangle

    public abstract class Geometry
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines a non-specific Geometry.

      • findIntersections

        public abstract java.util.List<Point3D> findIntersections(Ray ray)
        Find all intersections that a Ray makes with a Geometry.
        Parameters:
        ray - Ray that is shot towards a Geometry.
        Returns:
        List of 3D Points intersected by the given Ray.

      • getNormal

        public abstract Vector getNormal(Point3D point)
        Get the normal Vector of a Geometry.
        Parameters:
        point - 3D Point in a Geometry.
        Returns:
        The normal(perpendicular) Vector of the Geometry, in a specific 3D Point.
